--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> OOC: Can't you too just meet in real life, beat the hell out of  
each 
> other and then be even with all that crap? Could you at least try, 
and 
> I mean BOTH OF YOU, to calm down a bit and both stop moding? The 
game 
> isn't who started first, it's who will be moderated because of all 
the 
> pressure the other players are putting on the council! I mean can't 
> you at least keep your war to private email? I like to see 
development 
> in the storyline, yet you two only seem to bash as hard as you can 
on 
> each other's char! I am no council member, but I am so fucking tired 
> of you two playing against each other and not alongside! And your 
> constant reactions to your comments just make it worse! This message 
> is also meant to advise other players thinking that this is getting 
> out of hand to take up responsibilities and protest against it. You 
do 
> not have to do it publicly, but act in some way!
